info.name: Stylus Insomniac
info.description: A dark gray theme for Stylus. Stylish is not supported. Intended for use with the default CodeMirror theme. There are advanced options for a compact layout with 2, 3 or 4 columns. The compact layout works with the new default UI, so the classic UI will remain the same if selected.
info.additionalInfo: Bug reports or suggestions are welcome. Thanks to calicoå¥³ for assisting with the advanced options.

options.label: Yes
2 Columns
4 Columns
